alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 3:03PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northern Indiana, including the following county, White. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Dam releases may exceed 9000 cfs the rest of today and possibly into Wednesday. Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
